resources.string:
"IT Help Desk support system"
The users may report for their IT related issues / problems using following process :-
First Level:- Register your issue either by email (ithelpdesk@sharda.ac.in) or can call direct on ext. no. - 2856 (within office hrs. only).
Second Level:- Issue can be Escalated to Mr. Dharmedra Kumar (dharmendra.kumar1@sharda.ac.in) and available on ext. no. - 2858 (within office hrs. only).
Wi-Fi Login related Issues :- First user have to register for the verification of his /her credentials himself using Wi-Fi portal for Wi-Fi authentication (Login ID & Password).
If you are facing any problems in this process, you have to personally visit with your device ( Laptop / Mobile /Tab) at IT –Service department SDS Building , First Floor, Data Centre, IT Service Department to get it resolved.
Registration Process for Wi-Fi network access :-
Connect with SHARDA-WiFi and as soon as you click on your browser a registration/login page will open. You have to fill required mandatory fields.
The Mandatory Requirements For Wi-Fi Registration:-
Ø Sharda System ID ( In Case of Student ) / Employee Code (In Case of Employee of SHARDA University).
Ø Email ID (*only Sharda email ID e.g. For employee abcd@sharda.ac.in , For Students it would be abcd@ug.sharda.ac.in, abcd@pg.sharda.ac.in ) you will receive mail from Wi-Fi system generated for triggering OTP for password Only on official mail-id ( Sharda Mail Domain )
Ø Sharda Email-id can be login on Gmail.com
Ø Mobile Number ( On this No you will get OTP (One Time Password)
Ø Date of Birth ( As mentioned in the document )
Ø Batch Year (Only for Students)
Ø Employee or Student are allowed to connect WiFi on 2 devices(Mobile, Laptop or tab etc.) only. In case if user wants to change his/ her device then he/ she has to fill request form for the same and submit to IT-Services department at SDS Building , Data Center.
How to Register: Ø Users need to connect with SHARDA Wi-Fi , login page will appear.
Ø Once user clicks “Register” post completing all relevant information on the form, Users will get the mail on his Sharda Email ID for activation password.
Ø As Soon As you will Clicking the URL received on mail he/she will received OTP SMS for password.
Ø To reach Sharda mail ID, short term internet access will be allowed.
Ø If user doesn’t activate the link on mail ID within the time period (e.g. 10 Min.), he or she has to re register/ repeat this process himself after Half An hours.
Ø Access will not be allowed till he activates the link. Once expired, user will need to ask re-generate password.
Ø Password Life cycle/ Validity: Password will be Valid for Six Months
Ø Change of Mobile No.: Once registered than user can not change himself, He/she has to fill request form for the same to IT- Service Department at SDS Building , Data Centre.
Connect Wi-Fi with the following SSID’s:-
There are two Wi-Fi SSID’s in University campus, one is SHARDA-WIFI and second is SHARDA-WLAN.
Ø SHARDA-WIFI will be available in all Hostels.
Ø SHARDA-WLAN will be available in Educational Blocks, 1,2,3,4,7,21 and all staff quarters and Hospital area.
Note: - Username and password for Wi-Fi authentication will be same in both Areas. (i.e. Hostels and Other Blocks.)
**
(If issue is still not resolved in speculated time, may reach to Mr. Mahesh Kandwal (Head -IT Services) at email-id- mahesh.kandwal@sharda.ac.in and available on ext. no. 2803)
THE ADVANCED PROCEDURES AT SHARDA HOSPITAL HAVE OPENED NEW FRONTIERS OF HOPE FOR PATIENTS WHO ARE SUFFERING FROM LIFE THREATENING.ALSO THE STUDENTS OF SHARDA GET DISSCOUNT THEIR.

string-array.name: cafeteria_list
string-array.item: 1.UNCLES CAFE:It is at the corner of block-1(eat anything).
2.CCD:It is at the left of Uncles cafe(at block-1).
3.ICECREAME PARLOR:It is at the right of Uncles cafe.
4.GEORGIA:You can get fast food here near(gate number-4).
